src_original: āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana saṃghāṭīṃ tāvat sīvyāmi paścād āgamiṣyāmi /
tgt_original: 汝先去至彼，我即來。 目連云：

src_original: āyuṣmañ chāriputra yadi na yāsyasi saṃghāṭī tāvat sīvayitavyaḥ /  tataḥ paścād yāsyasi /  āyuṣmañ chāriputra sāhāyyaṃ kalpayāmi /
tgt_original: 若不時去，吾捉汝臂將向彼泉。

src_original: evaṃ kuruṣva /  athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ svarddhyā pañcabhir aṅgulibhiḥ sīvayitum ārabhaḥ /
sa āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇoktaḥ /  āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana yady evam anyasūtrā bhavatu /
tgt_original: 舍利弗即解衣帶著地，語目連言：

src_original: idaṃ tāvat prāg eva māṃ balena nayiṣyasi /
